summary: Any mention of crypto was deliberately veiled at this year’s festival. And that strategy might catch on.
title: Crypto Was Afraid to Show Its Face at SXSW 2023
detailed_content: IN 2022, I attended my first SXSW, and I couldn’t escape the suffocating atmosphere of crypto evangelism. A convention that touts itself as the nexus of art and technology, it seemed fertile ground for the seemingly growing NFT community. This year? I could barely find a mention of crypto. And the few who did bring it up seemed embarrassed to do so.
author: BY ERIC RAVENSCRAFT
